Title: A Researcher's Notes
Text:
Greetings, visitor from the future. If you find yourself here, please help me perform one last check.

If there's any leftover erroneous data in the room, make sure to clean it up completely to eliminate potential risk.

Do NOT trust or respond to anything you see on the screen.

The backup analysis room is the anchor I left for youâ€”The data there is absolutely correct.

If the analysis room shows anything different from the backup room, check all data immediately and restore the room to its original state.

Remember, recheck both analysis rooms and make sure they are the same. Ensure all data is thoroughly deleted.

The transfer route will always be here.
